message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering its unique value proposition, I would like to offer it to you for $150. I'm confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $120. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $120?
